pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Select and align nested models

content.raw:
Not sure if this is intended:

1. Click on double pendulum in 3D view and see that 3 nodes are now selected in the SV. 

1. Ctrl + Click on one of the selected nodes in SV and it becomes deselected - I was expecting this to deselect all 3 nodes?
content.html:
Not sure if this is intended:

  1. Click on double pendulum in 3D view and see that 3 nodes are now selected in the SV.

  2. Ctrl + Click on one of the selected nodes in SV and it becomes deselected - I was expecting this to deselect all 3 nodes?
